official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to pay compensation to individuals of Japanese descent residing on the territory of Guam during World War II for damages caused such individuals by the Armed Forces of the United States.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay to Japanese residing in Guam during World War II compensation for damages inflicted by the armed forces of the United States.
